projects.name: Public Photography Contest using Social Media Polling
projects.description: Developed a web-based application using HTML/CSS, Flask, and Python, managing contests, notifications, and winner selection.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System using Machine Learning
projects.description: Developed a content-based movie recommendation system using NLP for feature extraction. Built user profiles to calculate movie similarities, delivering personalized recommendations based on user preferences.

projects.name: Google Play Store Analysis
projects.description: Conducted an in-depth analysis using Python, uncovering significant patterns and contributing to a 10% increase in app performance metrics.

experiences.description: Collaborated with university faculty on predicting Bitcoin prices using machine learning, resulting in a 15% improvement in prediction accuracy. Developed an LSTM model for time series forecasting, reducing prediction loss to 0.002 and achieving a 99.5% R-Square coefficient.

Analyzed diverse datasets using Python, delivering actionable insights that improved decision-making processes. Implemented statistical models and visualization tools, culminating in a comprehensive analysis of the Google Play Store, which highlighted key trends and user behaviors.
